attributes.additional_details: Many people I have spoken to and seen comments of have stated they voted to leave - I'd now like to give these people a petition along with the remain group to sign against a re-referendum
attributes.background: I feel that if the result of the referendum would have been remain there would be no consideration to have another referendum vote, along with this I feel the 100,000 that have signed it will be all or mainly the remain voters so it's not a true reflection.
